dimension: 27 5/8 x 26 15/16 in. (70.17 x 68.42 cm) (without ties or fringe)
title: Festival apron
description: black waistband; multicolored woven ties; outer blue silk brocade panels; inner panel of off-white decorated with black, salmon, green, lavender and purple embroidery in geometric diamond designs with horizontal geometric bands below; short maroon fringe on central decorated panel
creditline: Given in memory of Lynn Swanson
